mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_rooms ( room_id, name, type, max_users, image_url ) VALUES ( #{roomId}, #{name}, #{type}, #{maxUsers}, #{imageUrl} )
mapper.select: SELECT room_id as roomId, name, type, max_users as maxUsers, image_url as imageUrl FROM chat_rooms ORDER BY room_id DESC
SELECT room_id as roomId, name, type, max_users as maxUsers, image_url as imageUrl, created_at as createdAt FROM chat_rooms WHERE room_id = #{roomId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_messages ( room_id, sender_cuid, content, sender_nickname ) VALUES ( #{roomId}, #{senderId}, #{content}, #{senderNickname} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, room_id as roomId, sender_cuid as senderCuid, sender_nickname as senderNickname, content, DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createdAt FROM chat_messages WHERE room_id = #{roomId} ORDER BY created_at ASC
